title: Executive Order 6488-Amendment of Schedule A, Subdivision XIII, of the Civil-Service Rules
content: By virtue of the authority vested in me by the provisions of the last sentence of the eighth paragraph of subdivision second of section 2 of the Civil Service Act of January 16, 1883 (ch. 27, 22 Stat. 403, 404), schedule A, subdivision XIII, of the civil-service rules is hereby amended by the addition of a paragraph reading as follows:
" 2. One position of Director of Information and one position of Administrative Assistant in the Office of the Secretary."
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 6488-Amendment of Schedule A, Subdivision XIII, of the Civil-Service Rules Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/373213
